Claude Elwood Shannon
 30.04.1916 - 24.02.2001
 Biography:
 He was an American mathematician, electrical engineer, and cryptographer known as "the father of information theory.

William Shockley\n 13.02.1910 - 12.08.1989\n He was an American physicist and inventor. Shockley was the manager of a research group at Bell Labs. They were jointly awarded the 1956 Nobel Prize in Physics for their discovery of the transistor effect.
Guido van Rossum\n 31.01.1956\n He is a Dutch programmer best known as the author of the Python programming language which means he continues to oversee Python development.
